name: The Good, the Bad and the Eldritch
name_original: The Good, the Bad and the Eldritch
description:
This game can be played on local network (yeah we know it's not the best time for those, we couldnt implement game discovery over the internet in time). 

To play with a friend over local network: 

- Find your IP adress (On windows 10 it's Start Menu > Network > Properties > Ipv4) and give it to your friend

- Create a room 

- Have your friend connect to your server with your ip adress

- The game can start when both of you are ready !

Instructions : 

WASD (or ZQSD) to move

Left click to fire

Red powerups increase your fire rate

Green powerups give you health

F to revive a fallen teammate
